channel.title: Self Hosted Redash "TOO MANY REDIRECT ERROR"
channel.description:
We have set up Redash by following the instructions mentioned [here](https://redash.io/help/open-source/dev-guide/setup). Everything was working fine till the point we enabled "https" and now whenever we try to open the redash, we get "TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS". I have set `REDASH_ENFORCE_HTTPS` to true and added `REDASH_HOST` to the hostname with `https` scheme.
Also, we have apache server running to redirect the requests.

item.title: Self Hosted Redash "TOO MANY REDIRECT ERROR"
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
How did you introduce apache? Redash uses nginx?

Read full topic
